At least she still managed to catch him. That might’ve been better than stopping him as she already had a hold of him and he couldn’t run from her. She makes it to her cave in only a few minutes. It too her over a year to get all of the sticks and other materials. And she did it by herself. It is probably one of the things she is the most proud of doing. She finally reaches her nest. It is a huge nest that 4 adult gryphons could easily lay down in and still have plenty of room. It is much larger than most other gryphons’s nests that can barely fit two adults. 1452111112.title: Cave

14521111121.content:
Solbi’s mate, Tobias, snuggles up against Solbi and nuzzles the base of her neck with his beak. Tobias is a white gryphon with blue highlights. His beak is white and he has white front legs. His insides are blue. Tobias is about a foot smaller than Solbi. Solbi turns her head around and smiles lightly at him. She rolls over to show Tobias her large belly. Tobias looks at her curiously but doesn’t question her. He know that later he will see who is inside of her. She doesn’t make a big deal about her large belly when there is just food in it. Tobias snuggles up close to her belly and nuzzles it with his beak. Solving coos softly and curls up a bit, laying her head down on top of Tobias’s. The soon fall asleep curled up like that.

Solving wakes up first. She uncurls from Tobias and raises her head. She stretches and yawns a bit. This is the time when she would usually go out to hunt for breakfast but she isn’t hungry because she has Draco inside of her stomach, filling her up nicely. But just having something inside of her filling her up isn’t enough to keep her alive. She judged Tobias to wake him up, knowing that he would want to see Draco. Tobias wakes up with a yawn and looks up at Solbi, wondering what she wants. He then looks at her noticeable belly swaying slowly beneath her. He assumes that whatever he woke him up for involves whatever is inside of there.

Solbi: “i was hunting when I saw him walking in the woods by himself. He was walking towards a cliff that he didn’t notice. I flew down to stop him but I was too late. He fell. I fortunately caught him before he hit the water. Who knows what’s in there. I brought him up to the top of the cliff again and set him down. Probably worse that if he woke up in mine.”

Solbi: “Bye Toby.”
Tobias: “bye sol.”
Solbi climbs out of the nest and exits the cave. Tobias looks at the young dragon and wonders what he should do with him.
14521111121.title: Yes.

145211111211.content:
Since Tobias is not allowed to eat Draco, the next best thing is to just put him in his pouch. It’s soft and lined with fur, and warm due to his body heat. Draco might like it in there, he thought. Makes have pouches in his species of gryphon. The females carry their pups in their wombs and for the next few months the males carry them in their pouches. Tobias rolls over onto his back and picks up the dragon with a claw. He sets Draco down on his chest, tail towards his pouch. With his other claw he pulls open his pouch and he slides Draco into it with the same claw that picked him up. His pouch is lined with soft blue fur. Draco twitchs his tail in his sleep as it tickles his underbelly. Draco is about the size of a normal gryphon pup so he easily fits inside tobias’s pouch. The then lets go of his pouch, letting it close around Draco before rolling over onto his belly. His weight pressing down against Draco gets Draco closer to his core and heats him up a bit more. Draco is still asleep though and Tobias decides to take a nap as he was woken up by Solbi before he could finish with his sleep.
(Time skip to twenty minutes later. Draco’s POV)
Draco wakes up. The first thing he notices is that he is still alive and that solbi hadn’t digested him after all. The second thing he noticed was that he was not in a stomach anymore. He is in a very warm and furry place. He had no idea where he could be. But he was probably safe in there for the time being. Even though he might be safe, he still wanted out. He had spent way more time inside of another creature that he ever wanted to spend in his lifetime. He starts to squirm a lot, and push on whatever is pressing down on top of him. It seems to have worked because whatever he was inside shifts a bit and grumbles. They did not sound like there were amused by his antics. But he keeps squirming, hoping he would be let out.

Tobias was suddenly jolted out of his peaceful sleep by something squirming inside of his pouch. He grumbles as he wakes up, not happy that he was woken up a second time. He then remembered that he had put the sleeping Draco inside of his pouch and he probably has woke up. He snaps out of his mood and sits up. He the reaches down to his pouch with a claw to pull it open.

Draco stops squirming when he notices something enter the place he was in. It looks like a gryphon’s talon. The talon then pulls something open and light floods the place he was in. Draco looks around. He realizes that he can’t be in solbi because there is blue fur around him and the talon is white. Solbi’s talons are yellow. He then pokes his head out of what he soon realizes is a pouch. His muzzle is pressed up against the fur right above the pouch. He then hears a voice above him.
???: “good morning Draco, how was your sleep?”
Draco: “who are you... and why am I in your pouch?”
???: “I am Tobias. Solbi’s mate. She left to go hunt but she’ll be back soon.”
Draco: “solbi? She’s not here? Good. I can escape before she comes back.” He turns around and starts to climb out of tobias’s pouch.
Tobias: Tobias pushes Draco back down. “I don’t think she’d like that. She told me to keep an eye on you. He would be furious with me if I let you go.”
Draco: Draco looks up at Tobias. He sees Tobias looking down at him, head cocked. “Please Tobias... you have to let me go... she ate me... I’m scared of her...” he shivers, reliving his past experience with her.
Tobias: “I know that. She came in her with you in her stomach. She slept with you in there all night and regurgitated you in the morning. If she wanted to hurt you, she wouldn’t have done that.
Draco: “yeah but still.” He shivers in fear again.
Tobias: he rubs draco’s head with a claw. “I won’t let her hurt you Ok? I don’t think she will but if she tries, I’ll stop her.”
Draco: “o-Ok thanks”
Tobias: “you’re welcome. Anyways, do you like my pouch.”
Draco: “y-yeah. It’s ok.”
Tobias: Tobias smiles. “I thought you would. Just think of her stomach like my pouch. Just not furry, wet, and warmer.”
Draco: “ok. I guess that makes sense. As long as like your pouch, her stomach doesn’t hurt me.”
Tobias: “it won’t. Trust me. And if she tries to put you in her womb, anus, or cock... just keep an open mind for me Ok? Just like my pouch, they won’t hurt you.”
Draco: “her w-womb?!? Her c-cock and a-anus?!? She might do that to me?”
Tobias: “yeah. She might. Just, try not to panic and flip out if she asks you. She will feel bad and ashamed if you do. If you don’t want to, just decline her offer. She will understand.”
Draco: “o-Ok I guess.”
Tobias: “and one last thing. She might offer to make you our child. Again, if you want to stay the way you are, just decline.”
Draco; “make me her child? How?”
Tobias: “she can unbirth you. And together with my seamen, you will slowly regress to an egg cell and then grown into a egg. We are oviparous meaning that we lay eggs. So she would then lay you, you would hatch and then I would keep you in my pouch for a bit. You would also be our first born.”
Draco: “o-Ok. I’m not sure about that.”
Tobias: “like I said, you don’t have to accept. Anyway, as for the other ways she could consume you. I could get you used to one if you’d like.”

15.title: Jade, the green smart one

151.content:
On your way back to the nest, you heard and went to several more small inattentive animals and, quietly sneaking up on them, tried to get them but Draco, (the white speedy one) ran in and ate every last one of them right before you were going to jump out and get them. After your failed attempt at hunting and getting a full meal, you disappointingly decide to head back to the nest and get some rest.

Little known to you, the nutrients from that small rabbit were having a direct impact on your size! Your dragon metabolism was taking these nutrients and growing you while your metabolism is working the hardest, while you were asleep. Albeit, it was a small increase in size, one inch taller and one inch longer at the absolute maximum, it was a fairly noticeable change, and being the smart one out of the group, you will be the first to figure this out.

Choice 1: The Next Morning: Still unable to talk and have proper cohesive thought other than knowing you need to eat, sleep, and leave waste when necessary, you(Jade) notice the change but do not think anything of it. Bigger animals appear.

Choice 2: One Week Later: Now being able to talk and have proper cohesive thought, you bring up the concept of the growth to your siblings. Bigger animals appear.

Choice 3: One Month Later: After one month of survival, all of the dragons are still alive and now 2ft tall and 2ft 6in long, you (Jade) finally bring up their growth in a conversation. Bigger animals (preditorial)/humans (non preditorial) appear.


These small Dragons do not need to eat everyday, being able to survive on things such as a small rabbit for over three months without eating another bite. I, the writer, am keeping the story like this to to keep their growth steady and to not have them be massive while still infants. They can still grow with age, not just after eating.

1511.content:
Just a quick bio for Jade.

Jade, out of the group of her four other siblings, is considered the smart one of the group. No one really knows WHY she is, it was just like that when she hatched. Her features consist of her scales being a. Well. JADE green color over most of her body but they get brighter to an emerald green color on the tip of her tail and on her toes. Though they haven't grown in yet, she will grow short horns in horizontal groups of three that are parallel to each other on both sides of her flat head that slant at a 45 degree angle. Her tail is and always will be the length of her body. Speaking of her tail, she will become very skilled at using it as sort of an extra arm to grab and/or push things that she needs to get and get away from herself respectively. She is introverted and likes to be alone most of the time but does like to play with her siblings at times. Her being introverted can be both a blessing and a curse depending on the situation. Say her other siblings are playing and they get attacked by a bigger animal or a large group of animals, she would be at a safe distance to make and escape. But say things go bad for her and she is snuck up on and dragged away. She would not be able to call for help to let her siblings know that she was in trouble.

I am very sorry for not putting this in place of the chapter previous to this and I hope anyone who reads this to forgive my stupidity and continue reading this branch of this interactive. Anyway. Let's get this story going.
